data.title: Platoon
data.text: A military unit consisting of two or more squads or sections. Most police works are done by platoon. For example, Crowd controlling.

Platoon Formartions can be 4 types-
1. Platoon In-Line Formation
2. Platoon In-Threes Formation
3. Platoon In-Line of Section in Threes
4. Platoon In Column of Sections
N.B. Use Dark Mode for better view.
